alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 8:00PM MST until December 28 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, locally higher benches. * WHERE...The Wasatch Front and Tooele Valley, along with the Sanpete and Sevier Valley, in addition to west central and southwest Utah. * WHEN...Through 4 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter driving conditions along the I-15 corridor along with other area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will move across central and southwest Utah through the remainder of the evening and overnight hours bringing heavy snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
